Uses of Class
Components.CPAMOJAComponent

  • Packages that use CPAMOJAComponent 
    Package Description
    Components
    Classes and hierarchies of packages used to implement grammar-aware engineering (GAE) components at the lexical, concrete and abstract syntax levels.
    Components.Abstract.Abstraction
    Provides classes and an interface implementing Abstractor component.
    Components.Abstract.AST
    Provides classes and an interface implementing AST component.
    Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree
    Provides classes and an interface implementing AST2BoxTree component.
    Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream
    Classes and an interface implementing BoxTree2Stream component.
    Components.Abstract.Patterns
    Provides the implementation of Patterns component.
    Components.Abstract.Signature
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Signature component.
    Components.Abstract.TreeEditor
    This package provides classes and an interface for implementing a TreeEditor component.
    Components.Concrete.Flattener
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a Flattener component.
    Components.Concrete.Grammar
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Grammar component.
    Components.Concrete.Parser
    Contains classes, interfaces and hierarchies of packages used to implement Parser components (interpreting, source-code generated and table-driven).
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser
    A base class and two packages used to implement Deterministic and Limited backtracker Parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser
    Provides a base class for source-code generated parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a source-code generated DeterministicParser component and its source-code view.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser
    Provides a base class for all LR parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser
    Provides classes and interface for implementing SLRParser component.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTables
    Provides a class and an interface for implementing ParseTable components.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing SLRParseTable component.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTree
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a ParseTree component.
    Components.Concrete.TreeBuilder
    Provides classes and interfaces for implementing TreeBuilder component for parse trees.
    Components.CoreHybridEditor
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a CoreHybridEditor component.
    Components.Formatter
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a Formatter (AST2Text) component.
    Components.Lexical.Scanners
    Provides classes and package for creating Scanner components.
    Components.Lexical.Scanners.TableDriven
    Provides classes necessary for implementing a DFAScanner component.
    Components.Lexical.ScanTables
    Provides classes and an interface implementing a ScanTable component.
    Components.Lexical.Stream2Text
    Provides classes for implementing a StreamtoText component.
    Components.Lexical.SymbolStream
    Provides classes and interface for implementing a SymbolStream component.
    Components.Lexical.SymbolStyleCustomizer
    Classes implementing a SymbolStyleCustomizer component.
    Components.Specifications.Language
    Classes composing a Language composite component.
    Components.Specifications.Presentation
    Classes composing a Presentation composite component.
    Components.Text2AST
    Provides classes composing a Text2AST composite component.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CNodeObject
      CNodeObject is an abstract class defining a method for returning a CNode object.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Abstraction

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Abstraction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CAbstractionComp
      Abstraction component holds a mapping from parse tree to AST.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CASTComp
      This class creates an AST component which holds the structural representation of an AST.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.AST2BoxTree 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CAST2BoxTreeComp
      A component which holds a mapping from AST to Box tree according to some pattern definitions.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.BoxTree2Stream 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CBoxTree2StreamComp
      BoxTree2Stream component with a mapping from box tree to symbolstream.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Patterns

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Patterns 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPatternsComp
      Holds box layout specifications concerned with producing nicely formatted text.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Signature

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.Signature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSignatureComp
      Holds the signature (abstract syntax) and maintains its consistency.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.TreeEditor

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Abstract.TreeEditor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTreeEditorComp
      A non-visual component with basic operations for editing the different kinds of nodes of ASTs.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Flattener

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Flattener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CFlattenerComp
      A Flattener component holds a mapping from parse tree to symbolstream.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Grammar

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Grammar 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CGrammarComp
      A component which holds lexical and context-free grammar definitions, and relations between them.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for both interpreting parser and table-driven parser components.
      class  CParserCompExt
      This class extends abstract base class CParserComp with tree building services.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CInterpretingParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for interpreting parser components.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CDeterministicParserComp
      A component holding an interpreting deterministic parser object.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CLimBacktrackerParserComp
      A component holding an interpreting limited backtracker parser object.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSourceCodeGeneratedParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for Source-code generated parser components.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSourceCodeDeterministicParserComp
      A component generating the source-code of a recursive-descent parser from a given grammar.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CLRParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for LR parser components.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser

      class  CSLRParserComp
      A component holding a SLR parser object.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParseTableComp
      This is a base class from which all parse table components descend.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTables.SLRParseTables 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSLRParseTableComp
      An implementation of a component which holds SLR(1)-based parse tables and maintains consistency between the textual representation of SLR(1) tables and their corresponding structural representation.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTree

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.ParseTree 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParseTreeComp
      This component holds a parse tree generated by any of the parser components linked to it, and maintains consistency between the textual and structural representation of the parse tree.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.TreeBuilder

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Concrete.TreeBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CECFGTreeBuilderComp
      An implementation of a tree builder for constructing parse trees.
      class  CTreeBuilderComp
      An abstract base class for all TreeBuilder components.

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.CoreHybridEditor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CCoreHybridEditorComp
      A small and flexible component providing the core functionality of hybrid editing.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Formatter

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Lexical.ScanTables

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Lexical.ScanTables 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CScanTableComp
      An implementation of a component which holds scan tables (NFA and DFA) and maintains consistency between the textual representation of the scan tables tables and their corresponding structural representation.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSymbolStyleCustomizerComp
      This component holds a mapping from grammar symbols to symbol categories and symbol categories to font and color attributes.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Specifications.Language

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Specifications.Language 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CLanguageComp
      A composite component which holds lexical syntax, concrete syntax and abstract syntax specifications.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Specifications.Presentation

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Specifications.Presentation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPresentationComp
      A composite component containing facilities for customizing the presentation style of program text to user's preferences.

    • Uses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Text2AST

      Subclasses of CPAMOJAComponent in Components.Text2AST 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CText2ASTComp
      A composite component which scans and parses program text to ensure that its lexically and syntactically well-formed and if successful its mapped to an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST), other wise it generates appropriate error messages.
